```{r}
# r
library(reticulate)
x = 42
print(x)

```


```{r}
# r
x = x + 12
print(x)

```


```{python}
# python
x = 42 * 2
print(x)
```

```{r}
# r
py$x
```


```{r}
# r
py$y = 1:5
```


See the value of `y` in the Python session:

```{python}
# python
print(y)
```
